contentList.content: Your chance to hit an enemy. On miss with a melee weapon, you trigger Warmup which increase your Accuracy and Movement (improved by Warfare), stackable up to 4 times.
The damage you inflict when successfully hitting an enemy or object.
Increases all damage by [1]% per point. Dodge is increased by [2]% and Celerity by [3]m per AP per point. Increase Accuracy bonus cap from Intelligence by [4]% and Critical Multiplier by [5]%.

Increases all damage by [1]% per point. Magic spells damage is further increased by [2]% and Accuracy by [3]% per point. Each point also increase Ingress bonus cap from Strength by [4] and Wisdom bonus cap from Wits by [5].

Increases all damage by [1]% per point. Damage dealt with martial attacks are further increased by [2]%. Also increases Ingress by [3] up to the cap set by Intelligence. Allows you to lift and carry heavier items.

Wits increase Critical Chance by [1]%, Initiative by [2], increases damage dealt status ticks by [3]% per point and your ability to detect traps and find hidden treasures. Increase Wisdom by [4]%, up to the cap set by Intelligence.
(require more Strength to unlock full potential)
(require more Finesse to unlock full potential)
(require more Intelligence to unlock the full potential)

Your chance to Critically Strike when attacking with a weapon or when using a weapon-based skill. If you Backstab, your Critical Chance is converted to additional damage : for 1% of Critical Chance, you gain [1]% damage. Critical chance above 100% is added to critical multiplier.
Total damage: [1]-[2]
+[1] point(s) = +[2]% to all Damage, +[3]% Dodge, +[4]m of movement per AP and +[5]% to Accuracy cap (given by Intelligence).
[1] point(s) = +[2]% to all Damage, +[3]% more for spells, +[4]% Accuracy, Ingress by [5]% and Wisdom cap from Wits by [6].
Spells gets a bonus of +[1]% from Intelligence
Reduce damage going through Magic Armour by [1]%
+[1] point(s) = +[2]% to all Damage and +[3]% more for weapon-based attacks and +[4]% to Ingress cap (given by Intelligence).
+[1] point(s) = +[2]% Critical Chance, +[3] Initiative, +[4]% damage done by harmful statuses and +[5] Wisdom[6].
Dual-Wielding increases damage, Dodging and Armour Penetration when wielding two Single-Handed weapons.
Dual-Wielding
Level [1]: Water attacks deal +[2]% more damage, +[3]% Vitality healed, +[4]% Magic Armour from skills and potions.
Next Level [1]: Water attacks deal +[2]% more damage, +[3]% Vitality healed, +[4]% Magic Armour from skills and potions.

Recovers armour passively at the start of every turn. This effect cannot be shared and is not affected by healing modifiers. This effect is disabled while under the effects of crowd control. Also increase maximum armours and provide the same amount on resurrection.
Level [1]: Recover [2] Armour every turn and increase maximum armours by [3].
Next Level [1]: Recover [2] Armour every turn and increase maximum armours by [3].
Ranged increases damage and Critical Chance when using bows and crossbows. Also increases the range when wielding a bow, crossbow or wand(s) up to 2 meters.
Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% Critical Chance and increase Range by [4]m.
Next Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% Critical Chance and increase Range by [4]m.
Receive a [1]% Damage penalty if the target is closer than [2] meters
Two-Handed increases damage and Critical Multiplier when using two-handed melee weapons (swords, axe, mace, spear or staff).
[1] increases all Physical damage you deal and improve your Warmup status.
Next Level [1]: Physical attacks deal +[2]% more damage, Warmup accuracy bonus increased by [3]% and movement bonus is increased by [4]% per stack.
Level [1]: Physical attacks deal +[2]% more damage, Warmup accuracy bonus increased by [3]% and movement bonus is increased by [4]% per stack.
Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% accuracy and +[4] Toughness.
Next Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% accuracy and +[5] Toughness.
Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% Critical Multiplier.
Next Level [1]: +[2]% Damage, +[3]% Critical Multiplier.
Enemies need to have Physical or Magic armour down to be targetable.
Base Level [1] Damage
Base Weapon Level [1] Damage
Average Level [1] Damage

Base level damage is level scaled damage for a 100% damage hit. Average Level damage takes into account the average bonus from attributes and abilities and is a good point of reference to evaluate the damage effectiveness of your character.
Heals for a minimum of "..tostring(vitalityAmount).." Vitality.
Absorb [1] for [2] turns.
Creates or reinforce a shield absorbing [1] [2] damage.
Creates a shield absorbing [1] [2] damage.
Shield remaining power: [1]
Consume up to [1] Source points to increase the execution threshold by [2] per SP. (current threshold: [3])
Increase the execution threshold by [1] if the target is under the influence of
Attempt to execute the target if their Vitality falls under [1] HP after the hit.
Absorb surfaces to boost the skill.
Explode target, causing damage in a [1] meters radius
per hit
Each hit will throw a projectile to the nearest target in a [1] meters radius
On [1] expiration
On activation: [1]
Weapon bonus: [1]
Status: [1]
Bonus from
Bonus from Attributes
Drinking a second potion during your turn will reduce your AP by 1 the next turn, and drinking a third one will immediatly end your turn and reduce your AP by 3 the next turn.
Clear Crippled, Atrophy and Diseased.
From Attributes : [1]%
Resistance Corrosion
Reduce damage going through Physical Armour by [1]%
Reduce damage going through Physical and Magic Armour by [1]%
From Strength weapon bonus : [1]%
Refund 1 AP on use if the user is Wet.
Prevent the attacker to Warmup when you dodge.
Enemies can only be targeted if one of their armour is depleted.
Also triggers the Strength weapon bonus.
This character has been magically affected during recovery.
This characters dodging has become less effective.
Deals [1] damage each turn.
Any attempt to apply Stunned, Petrified, Frozen, Madness, Terrified or Charm will apply Confused instead.
Slow enemies in [1] range.
Any attempt to apply Knocked Down or Chicken Form will apply Staggered instead.
This summon is weaker.
This character drank too many potions and is experiencing side effects.
This character drank too many potions and could not handle the side effects.
This character has already drunk one potion during their turn. Drinking another potion before the end of the turn will have side effects.
The amount of damage going through Physical and Magic Armour is reduced by half.
This character has staggered during their recovery.
Armour penetration

Set the percentage of damage going through armours.
Default : 50
Last armour penetration

Set the percentage of damage going through armour when one type of armour is depleted. Additive to the first value.
Default : 25
Armour Damage Multiplier

Apply a multiplier to all Corrosive and Magic damage.
Default : 100
Attributes Soft Cap

The number of points you can invest in an attribute. Doesn't concern bonuses from statuses and equipment.
Default : 40
Crit. Chance Backstab Bonus

The damage bonus provided per Critical Chance percent when backstabbing.
Default : 0.5
Base Accuracy

Default : 90
Require a game restart
CC Recover Duration

The duration of Momentum and Lingering when they are triggered.
Default : 2
CQB Ranged Combat Penalty
CQB Range Threshold

Set the target distance threshold which defines when do ranged weapons gets a penalty.
Default : 2
Crossbow Base Penalty

Set the base Movement penalty of Crossbows when they are equipped.
Default : -92
Require a game restart
Crossbow Penalty Per Level

Set the Movement penalty of Crossbows growth per level.
Default : -8
Require a game restart
Finesse Critical Chance Bonus

Default : 1
Require a game restart
Finesse Global Damage Bonus
Default : 3
Finesse Movement Bonus

Default : 20
Require a game restart
Fix Vitality Gap
Use this if you enabled Vanilla Plus on a running save and you witness most characters and items lack some Vitality.
Warning ! Use it only if you enabled Vanilla Plus in a running save and witness everything lacking Vitality. The fix might be somewhat inaccurate and can potentially break encounters. Proceed ?

Warning ! Changing the vitality scaling will break the vitality of the characters on the current map (in story mode) or on all scenes (in GM mode). It is highly recommended that you enable this option during the character creation before starting the game, or if you are in GM mode before creating your scenes. Proceed ?
Warning ! Deactivating the linear scaling will break characters vitalities again. If you do it in story mode, it is recommended to do it just before transitioning to a new act. Proceed ?
Enable Linear Vitality Scaling

Change the vitality scaling to be linear instead of exponential. The difference of Vitality, Armours and Damage between levels are much lower, avoiding weapons fast obsolescence and making inter-levels combats more fair.
Default : off
Require a map reload. It is highly recommended to activate this option before starting a new game (during character creation), and deactivating it mid-playthrough will break all NPCs vitality.
Disable Linear Vitality Scaling
Switch back to the exponential scaling. Break vitalities of characters on the current map (story mode), or on all scenes (GM mode).
Intelligence Accuracy Bonus

Default : 2
Require a game restart
Int. Global Damage Bonus
Default : 2
Intelligence Skill Damage Bonus
Default : 3
Corrogic

If Corrosive or Magic damage is dealt while the corresponding armour is depleted, they will strip resistances for 2 turns. Can be stacked, the resistance loss is proportional to the damage dealt and the max vitality of the target. Can be removed with Fortified or Magic Shell.
Default : on
Divine Talents Plus

Enable talents from Gift Bag 4, with effects slightly adapted to Vanilla Plus gameplay.
Default : on
Require a game restart
Dual CC Resistance

When recovering from a hard crowd control effect, both Momentum and Lingering will always be triggered together whatever the crowd control effect it was.
Default : off
Activate Jump fall damage
Activate fall damage when character use Jump skills or Projectile skills moving the character. Damage is not applied for Fly.
Activate Force fall damage

Activate fall damage when characters are victim of the Force property of some skills.
Scoundrel reduce the height tolerance for each point. Damage is not applied if the victim has Wings.
Dodge Fatigue

Enable the old dodge system, triggering Dodge Fatigue instead of Warmup on dodges.
Default : off
Classic Chameleon Cloak

Revert Chameleon Cloak ability requirements to Polymorph 1 only.
Default : off
Require a game restart
Classic Teleport

Revert Teleport and Nether Swap targetting to unconditional.
Default : off
Require a game restart
Real Jump

This module transforms Cloak and Dagger, Phoenix Dive and Tactical Retreat as projectile equivalents (like Fly with Spread your wings). It applies to everyone. If some NPC still have the classic version, deactivate and reactivate this module.
Activate stats correction

Activate the stats correction formula. Strongly recommended when playing Story mode or any Adventure mod that has not been balanced for Vanilla Plus.
Default : on
Require a game restart
Activate for GM mode

Activate the stats correction formula for GM mode. This is up to your preferences, but if you already created and balanced encounters, you might need to rebalance them.
Default : off
Require a game restart
Main Attribute Correction

The correction indice for the highest damaging attribute for NPCs. The higher it is, the lower will be the final result.
Default : 50
Require a game restart
General Attribute Correction

The correction indice for damaging attribute if there is a tie between two or all three damaging attributes for NPCs. The higher it is, the lower will be the final result.
Default : 60
Require a game restart
Secondary Attribute Correction

The correction indice for the damaging attributes that are not the highest for NPCs. The higher it is, the lower will be the final result.
Default: 70
Require a game restart
Pers. Resistance Bonus

Perseverance Resistance Bonus per point.
Default : 5
Perseverance Vitality Restoration

Set the percentage of vitality restored when Perseverance proc.
Default : 2
Player Vitality Multiplier

Multiply the base vitality of the player characters and summons.
Default : 100
Require a game restart
Potion Dizziness

The number of potions you need to drink in the same turn before receiving a warning of dizziness. Set to 0 to immediatly get a penalty after the first potion, and -1 to make potions usage brutally punishing. Default : 1.
Use recommended attribute values

If deactivated, you will be able to use custom attributes bonuses. Not recommended if you want to keep an overall balanced experience unless you really know what you are doing.
Default : on
Staff Skill Damage Multiplier

Set the skill damage multiplier percentage when a staff is equipped.
Default : 10
Strength Global Damage Bonus
Default : 2
Str. Resistance Bypass Multiplier
Default : 0.15
Strength Weapon Damage Bonus
Default : 3
Summons Damage Boost

Multiply all damages of summons (ally and enemy).
Default: +0%
Require a game restart
Summons Vitality Multiplier

Multiply the base Vitality of all summons (ally and enemy).
Default : 100
Require a game restart
Wand Skill Damage Multiplier

Set the skill damage multplier pencetage when a wand is equipped (can be doubled when dual-wielding).
Default : 5
Wands Surface Bonus

Bonus damage (%) from surface AND cloud the character stands in.
Default : 20
Wits Damage Over Time Bonus
Default : 10

Set the percentage of damage penalty when using a ranged weapon on a target within the CQB range limit.
Default : 35
Reduce Movement by [1]m
Transmute Skin Skillbook
Transmute Skin Skillbook
Transmute Skin Skillbook
Transmute Skin Skillbook
Bless target character or surface. Prevent Diseased, Decaying, Petrified, Stunned, increase Dodge by [1]%, Accuracy by [2]% and elemental resistances by [3].
Magnificent horns sprout from your forehead, making you see red. You can rush at your enemies and gore them. Increases Retribution ability by 2 for the duration.
Deal [1] and set Frozen to the characters in the cone.
Explode target corpse, dealing [1] in the area.

Consume frozen surfaces around you and convert them to Magic Armour. Recover 35% of the Magic Armour damage taken during the last turn and for the two next turns. Removes Frozen, Burning and Necrofire and provides immunity to Chilled.
Your inner demon actively watches over you. When an enemy approaches in melee range, they will be pummelled by a demonic fist dealing [1].
Throw [1] explosive traps at target locations. Each trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it, dealing [2].
Shoot a volatile bolt that deals [1], and then creates a corresponding surface. Chaos trigger a random type of damage.
Target a surface in melee radius. Elemental damage matching that surface is added to your weapon attacks and weapon-based skills.
Cause target character to teleport in a random direction each time they are attacked. Increases Dodge by [1]% and Air Resistance by [2]%.
Unlock ranged attack for your Incarnate. Provides [1] (amount depends on your level). Increases damage by [2]% and increase maximum Vitality by 15%.
Flaming Tongues protect you, immediately attacking approaching enemies and deals them [1].
Gain 1 Action Point immediately at the cost of [1] Constitution for 2 turns. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost.
Teleport a target character or item to a point of your choosing, dealing [1].
Sets off a chain reaction that causes ice areas to explode into water puddles, dealing [1] and setting Chilled.
Sacrifice yourself to bring an ally back to life. Reduce your Vitality to 1 and ressurrects target character with maximum Vitality.
Explode all corpses around you, dealing [1] in the area.

Each ally consumes frozen surfaces around them, converting the frozen surfaces to Magic Armour. Recover 35% of the Magic Armour damage taken during the last turn and for the two next turns. Removes Frozen, Burning and Necrofire and provides immunity to Chilled.

Each ally consumes oil surfaces around them, converting the oil surfaces to Physical Armour. Recover 35% of the Physical Armour damage taken during the last turn and for the two next turns. Removes Petrified and Stunned and provides immunity to Slowed.
Explode two random grenades or arrows in the inventories of every enemy, dealing [1] and set Atrophy in a target circle.
Target character receive Sparkmaster status that make melee attacks firing sparks that can fork twice at nearby enemies. Each spark hit deals [1].

Consume oil surfaces around you and convert them to Physical Armour. Recover 35% of the Physical Armour damage taken during the last turn and for the two next turns. Removes Petrified and Stunned and provides immunity to Slowed.
Unlock Whirlwind and Rush for your Incarnate. Provides [1] (amount depends on your level). Increases damage by [2]% and increase maximum Vitality by 15%.
Oil Spit
Target a circular area. Until your next turn, you will reflexively shoot at the first three enemies moving within this area if you have sight on them.
Deals [1] to the target character and set Atrophy. If target character is carrying grenades or arrows, a random one explodes in their inventory.
Incarnate learns how to go invisible and strike foes with a corrosive slash. Increases damage by [1]% and maximum Vitality by 15%.
Gain 2 Action Points immediately, but lose 3 Action Points next turn. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost.
Choose an available elemental skill. Each skill is unlocked if the ability requirements. Cooldown is shared between all available elemental skills.
Transmute Skin
Deal [1] damage to enemies in the area. Caster receives an aura that sets Silence and Suffocating on enemies.
Vacuum Aura

Remove poison surfaces and clouds. Gain poison damage bonus to weapon attacks and weapon-based skills (dependent upon size of poison area cleared) for 2 turns and your weapon attacks now also set Acid for 1 turn (3 turns if Venom Coating is also active).
Reset all cooldowns but remove your armours for 2 turns. Removes Burning, Necrofire, Poisoned, Bleeding, Momentum and Lingering.
Receive Sparkstriker status. This causes your melee attacks to create a Spark projectile that bounces off the initial target to hit the closest enemy, dealing [1].

If failure: [4] damage received.

For 2 turns, your target character's Vitality cannot be reduced below 1 point, keeping them alive against all odds. If the target is a summon, their lifetime will be prolonged for the duration. Once the effect expires, the character receive Forbearance for 2 turns, preventing any other death resist effect to be applied while it is active.
Elemental Weapons
Deal [1] damage. Damage is doubled if you are sneaking or invisible.
Destroy [1] on target enemy. They are Terrified for 1 turn.
Throw an explosive trap at target location. Trap takes 1 turn to activate. When active, the trap will explode when a character approaches it, dealing [1].
Damage is based on your level and trigger the additional skill bonus from Intelligence.
Damage is based on your basic attack and trigger the additional bonus from both Strength and Intelligence.
Incarnate learns a teleport skill, and a skill to swap places with its master. Increases damage by [1]% and maximum Vitality by 15%.
Inflict [1] each turn.
Magnificent horns sprout from your forehead, making you see red. You can rush at your enemies and gore them. Increases Retribution ability by 2 for the duration.

Water Absorption
The first skill used each turn has its cooldown reduced by one turn (minimum 1).
Ambidextrous reduces the cost of using grenades and scrolls by 1 AP when your off-hand is free. Refund the AP cost for 2 equipment switches per turn (except for Crossbows).
Arrow Recovery provides a 33% chance to recover a special arrow after shooting it, and removes the close-quarters damage penalty of ranged weapons.

A character with Demon has an extra 20% Fire Resistance, but takes a 15% penalty to Water Resistance. Additionally, the maximum Fire Resistance is raised by 10 and grants immunity to Burning and Necrofire.

A character with [1] has an extra 20% [3], but takes a [4]% penalty to [5]. Additionally, the maximum [3] is raised by [6]. Demon grants immunity to Burning and Necrofire. Ice King increases all Water damage you deal by 20% and grants immunity to Chilled.
[1] lets you evade attacks of opportunity. Increases your Dodge by 5% and Movement by 1m per AP.
Duelist increases AP Start and Recovery by 1, and Max AP by 1, if you are wielding a Single-Handed weapon with a free off-hand.
Duelist
Once per turn, reduce the AP cost of spells by one when the character is standing on a surface or a cloud of the same element.
Ranged weapons (including wands) deal 20% additional damage of the type of the surface the target stands on. Using a grenade or an arrow also now provide 1 turn of Elemental Weapons of the same type.
[1] allows you to flee combat even when enemies are close by. Provides immunity to Crippled, Entangled and Enwebbed.
[1] gives you [2] extra Action Points after dealing a killing blow once per turn and increase Movement by 2m for 1 turn.
With [1], you start every combat round with Maximum AP, but Magic and Physical Armour do not protect you from statuses. Also reduce max Vitality by 35%.

Your attacks never miss but cannot deal critical strikes (except backstabs not triggered by skills and if your weapon has higher level than you). Convert the critical bonus from Wits to resistance bypass.
While above 75% Vitality, Hothead provides 10% Critical Chance and 10% Accuracy.

A character with Ice King has an extra 20% Water Resistance, but takes a 15% penalty to Fire Resistance and the maximum Water Resistance is raised by 10. Inflicting Chilled or Frozen now also apply Frostbite, dealing Water damage over time. When Frostbite is reapplied on an active instance, its effectiveness is increased by 25% if it's from Chilled or 100% if it's from Frozen.

You gain immunity to stunned, frozen, knocked down, polymorphed, petrified, crippled for 1 turn after being affected by one of these statuses. Can happen once every 3 turns. Increase the duration of Momentum and Lingering by 1 turn.
Leech heals you when standing in blood. Also increases Lifesteal by 25%.
Mnenomic doubles all points invested in Memory.

When resurrected, you resurrect to full health. When your turn is skipped because of incapacitating effect(s), you start your next turn with 2 additional AP. You also start combat with 2 stacks of Warmup.
[1] gives you [2]% Dodging while dual wielding.
Pet Pal enables you to talk to animals. Also increases your maximum number of summons by 1, but reduces their damage and Vitality by 50%.
[1] gives all magical skills a critical chance equal to your critical chance score, and increase your Critical chance by 10%.
[1] adds an extra [2]m range to your grenade throws and increase their damage by 30%.

When an allied character dies, a Zombie Crawler is raised at their corpse, under their control. Zombie Crawler lasts 3 turns or until character is resurrected. Range 12m. Does not affect summoned creatures. Can happen only once per turn.
Stench decreases everyone's attitude towards you by [2], but melee opponents find you less attractive in combat. Increases your Poison resistance by 30% and makes you immune to Diseased and Infected.

Walk It Off reduces all status durations by 1 turn, including positive statuses. Does not affect statuses with a duration of 1 turn. Also increases elemental resistances by 8%, Physical and Piercing resistances by 4% and Toughness by 10 each time you are directly hit by a character, up to a maximum of 3 times until the next turn.

Perform a heavy attack that deals [1]. If the target armour corresponding to the main damage of the axe is stripped, it also deals 8% of the user max Vitality (up to 75% of the damage done by the hit) as the main axe damage but also increases cooldown by 1 turn.
Recklessness

Strike the target to deal [1]. Deals an additional 80% of this hit as armor damage corresponding to the main damage type of the mace. If there is no armor before the hit, cooldown is reduced by 1 turn.
Crush Armor
Perform a swipe cleaving all enemies within 3 meters of the target, dealing [1]. Each hit beyond the second character increases the cooldown by 1.
Cleave
Execute a long range thrust, dealing [1] over 8 meters. When hitting more than two characters, cooldown is increased by 1 turn for each additional hit.

While Sniper is active, increase Critical Chance by [1]% every time a non-offensive skill or item is used. When performing a Critical Hit, the bonus is reset to 0 and all stacks of Sniper are converted to Deadly Aim, increasing Critical Multiplier by [2] per stack for 2 turns (refreshed if already active). Sniper ends if the character moves, is attacked in melee or is victim of a crowd control effect.
Sniper
Increase critical chance every non-offensive skill or item used and resets when a critical hit happens.
Deadly Aim
Increase critical multiplier every successful critical hit done while Sniper is active. The higher Sniper is, the more critical multiplier is granted.
Quick Draw

Draw an arrow with haste and shoot to gain some time to deal [1]. Hit chance is capped at 80% and is further reduced with the distance from the target by 5% per meter beyond the third and immediately grants free movement equal to the travel distance of the arrow.
Create a magic field that increases Tougness by [1], reduces all direct damage taken from sources outside of the dome by 35% and recover Physical and Magic armours on cast.
Deal [1]. Reduce the target's Toughness to 0 and prevent Physical and Magic armour recovery for 2 turns. Set Knocked Down.

Vaporize ground surfaces into clouds if possible. Targeting an oil surface will splash it and spread in a 6 meters radius. Targeting a frozen surface costs 1 more AP and will trigger Ice Breaker, dealing damage to all targets on the frozen surface.

Hit and Run

Until the end of the turn, every hit done with a skill using a bow will provide 1 AP worth of free movement, up to 250% of the character base movement and are not affected by close quarter penalty. Unspent movement at the end of the turn will carry over to the next turn. Hit chance beyond 7 meters range is reduced by 10% per meter.

Target two circular areas to swap its surfaces and clouds. Refunds the AP cost if the caster is not within one of the areas. Deadly surfaces costs 6 AP, regardless of the situation.
Dagger attack that deals [1] and sets Bleeding and Terrified on target character. AP cost is reduced by 1 for each armour above 0 on the target.

The distance you can run with one action point.
Current Celerity: [1]
Celerity is the distance you can run without spending an action point at the start of a turn.

Aerotheurge spells trigger a Vaporize effect wherever they hit. If a Geomancy spell is targeted within a cloud, all enemies within receive 1 turn of Suffocating, up to 2 turns. If an enemy already has 2 turns or more of Suffocating, it increases its effectiveness by 20% instead, up to 200%.
Apply Wet or Chilled on a Burning target or vice-versa will trigger Thermal Shock. When it is active, surface ticks of normal Steam Clouds deal Water damage. Fire and Water damage received while Thermal Shock will use the lowest of both corresponding resistances and benefit of a bonus of 25 ArPen.
